articles.description: Ferrari would not have made the mistakes they made this season if they'd had Max Verstappen in the car.
articles.content:
Such has been Max Verstappen’s class this season that Dutch racer Michael Bleekemolen believes he would have won the title even if he’d been driving Charles Leclerc’s Ferrari.
Unlike in 2021 when Ve… [+2691 chars]

articles.author: Sahil Bakshi
articles.title: Shardul Thakur Takes To Twitter Seeking Help At Mumbai Airport, Harbhajan Singh Comes To His Rescue - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Shardul Thakur faced a bit of a problem at the Mumbai airport because of which he took to Twitter seeking help. Harbhajan Singh responded to Shardul's plea and helped the India pacer.
articles.content: Returning to Mumbai from Delhi after the third ODI between India and South Africa, pace bowler Shardul Thakur faced a hurdle at the airport as his kitbags went missing. Shardul had to take to Twitter… [+1820 chars]

articles.title: Watch: Rayudu, Sheldon Jackson involved in heated fight during SMAT match - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Ambati Rayudu and Sheldon Jackson were involved in a heated exchange during the Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy game between Baroda and Saurashtra on Wednesday. | Cricket
articles.content: Things turned ugly during a Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy Elite Group D game between Saurashtra and Baroda, as Sheldon Jackson and Ambati Rayudu engaged in a heated fight on Wednesday. Jackson, playing for… [+1872 chars]
